{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Turris.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless Open-Source Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Turris_v1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = CZ.NIC |model = Turris |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 11, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Turris_v1 |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale;P2020;P2020NSE2KC; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = Power |cpu1_type_rev = QorIQ |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL128P90TFIR1; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2chip = Micron;MT29F2G08ABAEA; |flash2size = 256 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Elpida;; |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D8:58:D7 |oui = 00:0B:6B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;Turris OS;OpenWrt-deriv;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 3 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 7.5 |pwr_amp_dc = 5.34 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, internal,, microUSB,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- yes,, populated,, 34-pin header ? -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = GPIO, SDIO, UART, I2C |addchip = <!-- Lattice;LCMXO1200C;;1; ,,, ETH CHIP;IM KSZ, 9031RNXCA, ;;1; --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Turris |defaultssid_regex = ^Turris$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/03/2014 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Wistron NeWeb DNXA-H1 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9390; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *{{WPLink|Turris Omnia}}
===Specifications=== *'''Turris 1.0''' - ''Wireless Router'' :CPU: [[Freescale]] P2020 @1.2GHz :Flash: 16MB (NOR), 256MB (NAND) :RAM: 2GB (DDR3 SO-DIMM) :WAN: 1x GbE, LAN: 5x GbE, 2x USB 2.0 ports :Wi‑Fi: 2.4/5 GHz Dual-Band (3×3 Mini PCIe) *'''Turris 1.1''' - ''Wireless Router'' :CPU: [[Freescale]] P2020 @1.2GHz :Flash: 16MB (NOR), 256MB (NAND) :RAM: 2GB (DDR3 SO-DIMM) :WAN: 1x GbE, LAN: 5x GbE, SIM Card slot :USB: 2x USB 2.0, 3x USB 3.0 (1x ext, 2x int) :Wi‑Fi: 2.4/5 GHz Dual-Band (3×3 Mini PCIe)
==Links of Interest== :[https://project.turris.cz/en/hardware Product page] {{•}} [https://project.turris.cz/en/news/turris/ News] {{•}} [https://project.turris.cz/en/overview/ Overview]
===News=== *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/turris-mox-modular-open-source-router-wifi/coming_soon ''Project Turris'' on '''Indiegogo''' campaign] *[http://www.tech-blog.pl/2014/01/03/turris-otwarty-projekt-bardzo-wydajnego-routera-z-czech/ ''Project Turris'' on '''tech-blog.pl'''] (internal images) *[http://openrouter.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=40&t=2986 ''Project Turris'' on '''openrouter.info'''] (internal images) *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/03/27/turris-mox-is-a-modular-router-with-wifi-ssd-lte-modem-ethernet-and-sfp-fiber-modules-crowdfunding/ ''Turris MOX'' review on '''SNX-Software''']
